thread.title: Sentence reduced for stepson who murdered poet Anne Jackson
thread.title_full: Sentence reduced for stepson who murdered poet Anne Jackson - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Sentence reduced for stepson who murdered poet Anne Jackson
text: A man jailed for life for murdering his stepmother at her Monmouthshire farmhouse has had his sentence reduced. Timothy Jackson, 49, from Sheffield, was jailed in March after pleaded guilty to the murder of Belgium-born poet Anne Jackson. Mrs Jackson, who wrote under the name Anne Cluysenaar, was found stabbed on 1 November 2014 at her home in Usk. The Court of Appeal in London ruled his 19-year minimum term was excessive and cut it to 16 years and eight months. Share this story About sharing
